alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Guadalupe County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN...WEST CENTRAL DE BACA...SOUTHWESTERN GUADALUPE AND EASTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM MDT... At 250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vaughn, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Vaughn. This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 180 and 204. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 262 and 296. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Guadalupe County
